description: Users have total control over their personal data, including sharing and deletion options.
Recognizes and response to user commands, including voice activation, push-to-talk, wake-word activation. Ensure the system responds to the user's voice when asked.

group_name: Assibility for visual and hearing impairments
feature: Accessibility features, design guidelines, and best practices
description: Customizable settings for users with visual or hearing impairments, including text-to-speech, speech-to-text, contrast adjustment, tactile sensory control & feedback, visual indicator options.

Directly contact emergency services or family members in case of an emergency, including fall detection and alerting caregivers. User can contact help directly with a panic button, or the system can uses its sensors to detect an emergency and trigger an alert - in the latter case, user can cancel the call if they don't need help. Include voice activation. The system must log the emergency event and the response taken.

Reminders for medication intake, including dosage and schedule. Reminders should be sent to user via sound, voice alerts, SMS, push notification - based on user preference. Should include a log of medication intake and missed doses.

Ease of communication with family and friends, including video calls, voice calls, and messaging. The system should include a contact list, call history, and message history. Ensure ease of use for older users and users with impairments. Tutorials and help options should be available.

The system is equipped with sensors to measure and monitor health metrics, including heart rate. The system should include a log of health metrics and alerts for abnormal readings. Caregivers should be able to access the health data remotely. The system should include a feature to alert caregivers in case of an emergency. The data are managed by the user.
The system should be easy to use for developers, including clear documentation for APIs. The system should include a developer portal with tutorials and examples, improving development experience.
